glsa.title: GNU Wget: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in GNU Wget might allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.

description.p: A buffer overflow was discovered in GNUâ€™s Wget.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
